item.title: Quick Server Port Question
item.description:
@360236 wrote:

It has been a while since I ran a server and I just wanted to take a peak and the server I was running. It says:

Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:36436.

But I changed the port to 43594 in server.java.

I thought it may be a small issue and tried connecting, but I could not connect. I tried searching for “36436” and could not find it. The server port was changed to “43594” but still uses 36436.

Where els would the port be?

I use DSPK source(PI).

Here is a snippet:

[QUOTE] static {
if(!Config.SERVER_DEBUG) {
serverlistenerPort = 43594;
} else {
serverlistenerPort = 43594;
}[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]
System.out.println(“Server listening on port 0.0.0.0:” + serverlistenerPort);[/QUOTE]

Thanks!

Read full topic
